titleStmt.title: John Boyle to W. H. Sidell
CWG14215

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.collection: Assistant Adjutant General Letter Book - No. 1 ; 5 Sept 1863 - 2 Feb 1864

body.p:
437
Jany 7" 3.
Maj W. H Sidell
Pro. Mar. Genl of Ky
Louisville Ky.
Sir,
The following is a Copy of dispatch this day received, which is forwraded for your information.

"Bridgeport Ala" Jany 6. 1864
To Govr T. E Bramlette --
I have the honor to report that over three 3. fourths of my regiment have enlisted as veteran Volunteers.
Respy. T. W. Price, Col. 21st Ky Infy"

Respy
Your obedt Servt.
John Boyle
Adjt Genl of Ky
